== About the Game ==

Crossbow Cavern is an exploratory platformer mainly revolving around the mechanic of utilizing your own projectiles as makeshift platforms. The game was put together in roughly two weeks as a personal challenge to develop a quick game!

A recently uncovered network of caverns is rumored to contain the legendary "greatest treasure!" Take up the challenge of being the first one to explore this underground labyrinth and see if you can discover the untold riches that are said to lie in wait. Take care, however, as dangerous beasts and deadly traps stand in your way to glory! Are you courageous and clever enough to overcome every obstacle and uncover the treasure of a lifetime?

== Features ==
  • 20 gameplay screens spread over three underground environments!
  • Three challenging boss encounters to test your crossbow skills!
  • Many secret treasures and background details to discover!
== Controls == -- General Controls --
  • F1, F2, F3, F4 keys: Adjust window size between 2x, 4x, 6x, or 8x resolution
  • F5 key: Adjust window size to best-fit resolution
  • Escape key: End the game
-- Menu Controls --
  • Z key / Y key / W key: Advance to the next screen
-- Game Controls --
  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Z key / Y key / W key: Jump
  • X key: Fire an arrow (once you acquire a crossbow)
  • A key: Respawn at the last checkpoint reached
